content:
### New nodes
#### Execution Data Save metadata for workflow executions. You can then search by this data in the **Executions** list. [Execution Data node documentation](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.executiondata.md).
#### LDAP node The LDAP node allows you to interact with your LDAP servers from your n8n workflows. [LDAP node documentation](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.ldap.md).
#### LoneScale node Integrate n8n with [LoneScale](https://www.lonescale.com/), a buying intents data platform. [LoneScale node documentation](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.lonescale.md).
